title: Ep. 236 "Blame It On The Alcohol"
description:
There are two sides to every story right ? Welp this week the ladies are getting the other side of their own stories lol or should we say the sober side?
Sit back relax and listen to some good ole drunk fables starring your fave podcast duo and some specials guests.
